Dataset.ID: the id of the dataset, should contain no special chars, defines dataset in URL
Dataset.Endpoint: url to a sparql endpoint cointaining metadata about the dataset, more information about the schema of the rdf can be found here
Dataset.Name: name of the dataset

Explanation.ID: the id of the explanation regarding this dataset, should contain no special chars, defines dataset in URL
Explanation.Label: label of the explanation file
Explanation.Method: used method can be max, noisy, or nrno which stands for Maximum, Noisy-OR or Non-redundant Noisy-OR respectively
Explanation.RuleConfig: information about the configuration used for learning the rules (optional)
Explanation.ClusteringConfig: information about the configuration used for learning the clustering (optional)

Dataset.Name: None
Dataset.Description: When selecting no metadata graph LinkExplorer will show you entities as they appear in the benchmark dataset (No labels of encoded entities, no descriptions, ...)
